about_the_game:
Do you like billiards? Do you like football?
Play the soccer world cup on a pool table
Now you can play this original billiard pool & soccer game with friends!
In this relaxed and casual pool billiards game combined with the fun and excitement of soccer, you can play online multiplayer, local multiplayer and against the computer (AI)
The game presents a pool table with the characteristics of a soccer field, where two soccer teams are made up of billiard balls and a ball that represents the soccer ball, which, just like in real soccer, the teams start lined up in your own playing field. The ball, just like in soccer, is placed in the middle of the field where each team will have to hit in turn with the aim of converting Goals!
Start playing Soccer on a Billiards table now!
You can choose the jerseys of the participating countries of the Qatar World Cup and many more, you also choose the stadium table of your choice, then you choose with how many players and how many goals the game will be.

name: FootPool

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window xp, vista o superior
  • Processor: intel Celeron
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia ddr2
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Tarjeta integrada stereo

short_description: FootPool is an original pool game that mixes with the rules of soccer
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Arabic, Polish, Turkish
